fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Cause a gas leak at someone's house, Priming players who visit them.
- Douse all primed players. 2 Uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The next person that a Primed player targets becomes doused. Then, the status wears off.
- Players who can no longer use the ability they were Primed with automatically become doused whenever they became unable to use it.
- Players who are Primed are notified.
